name: webtoon
title: 웹툰
fmt_list:
SELECT A.wtn_uid as cur_uid, title,today_title,lastno , 
  id, dates, C.prt_uid,
  C.name as portal_name ,
  C.list_webtoon as list_url,
  C.contents_webtoon as detail_url,
  A.updt_date as updt_date,
  A.comment as comment,
  A.reg_date as reg_date
  FROM neo_pwinfo.webtoon A , portal C
  where A.prt_uid = C.prt_uid  
  {extra_condition}
fmt_udpate:
UPDATE neo_pwinfo.webtoon
   SET
     prt_uid = '{prt_uid}'
     ,id = '{id}'
     ,title = '{title}'
   WHERE  wtn_uid = '{cur_uid}'

name: health
title: 건강기록
fmt_list:
SELECT seq, hlt_uid as cur_uid, sys_bp, dia_bp, pulse, weight, param, type, updt_date, reg_date, comment, 
CONCAT(sys_bp,'/' ,dia_bp,'(', pulse,')') as bp,
DATE_FORMAT(reg_date, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S") as dt,
SUBSTR( _UTF8'일월화수목금토', DAYOFWEEK(reg_date), 1) AS week
FROM health where True {extra_condition} order by reg_date desc
fmt_udpate:
UPDATE health
SET
  sys_bp = '{sys_bp}'
  ,dia_bp = '{dia_bp}' 
  ,pulse = '{pulse}' 
  ,weight = '{weight}'
  ,param = '{param}' 
  ,type = '{type}' 
  ,status = '{status}' 
 ,comment = '{comment}' 
  ,updt_date =now()
 WHERE hlt_uid = '{cur_uid}'

name: create_diary
title: 원석의 일기
description: 개인 일기 제목 자동 생성 페이지

name: passwd
title: 개인 PW 정보
fmt_list:
SELECT pwd_uid as cur_uid,site, B.title,ptail,B.phd_uid,id,A.etc ,A.updt_date
  FROM passwd A,pheader B where A.phd_uid = B.phd_uid {extra_condition} order by updt_date desc
fmt_udpate:
UPDATE neo_pwinfo.passwd
SET
  phd_uid = '{phd_uid}'
  ,site = '{site}'
  ,ptail = '{ptail}'
  ,id = '{id}'
  ,etc = '{etc}'
  ,updt_date = now()
 WHERE 
  pwd_uid = '{cur_uid}'

name: fav_link
title: 원석의 개인링크
description: 이 페이지는 개인 링크를 저장하는 페이지 이다..
fmt_list:
SELECT seq, fnk_uid as cur_uid, title, link, updt_date, reg_date, comment, type 
        FROM neo_pwinfo.fav_link where True {extra_condition} order by updt_date desc
fmt_udpate:
UPDATE neo_pwinfo.fav_link
SET
  title = '{title}' 
  ,link = '{link}' 
  ,updt_date = now()
  ,type = '{type}'
WHERE fnk_uid = '{cur_uid}'

name: today_contents
title: 오늘의 정보
description: 이 페이지는 유용 정보를 저장하는 페이지 이다.
fmt_list:
SELECT seq, tdc_uid as cur_uid , title, issue, solution, etc, updt_date, reg_date, comment 
   FROM neo_pwinfo.today_contents where True  {extra_condition} order by updt_date desc
fmt_udpate:
UPDATE neo_pwinfo.today_contents 
SET title = '{title)', issue = '{issue}', solution = '{solution}', updt_date = now()
WHERE tdc_uid = '{cur_uid}'

name: jcsg_novel
title: 장씨세가 호위무사 소설
fmt_list: SELECT seq, jc_uid, no, title, updt_date, reg_date, comment FROM neo_pwinfo.jcsg_contents;
